Package patchwork

Class Patch

java.lang.Object
patchwork.Patch
public class Patch extends Object
Representation of a patch in the Patchwork game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Patch(int cost, int time, int income, boolean[][] grid, int width, int height)
    Creates a new patch with the given cost, time, income, and grid.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patch

      public Patch(int cost, int time, int income, boolean[][] grid, int width, int height)
      Creates a new patch with the given cost, time, income, and grid.
      Parameters:
      cost - The cost of the patch.
      time - The cost of the patch in time.
      income - The income of the patch in buttons.
      grid - The grid representing the patch.
      width - The width of the patch grid.
      height - The height of the patch grid.

    • squareOccupied

      public boolean squareOccupied(int x, int y)
      Checks if a square at the specified coordinates is occupied in the patch.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the square.
      y - The y-coordinate of the square.
      Returns:
      true if the square is occupied, false otherwise.

    • patchOverlaps

      public boolean patchOverlaps(Patch other)
      Checks if the patch overlaps with another patch.
      Parameters:
      other - The other patch to check for overlap.
      Returns:
      true if the patches overlap, false otherwise.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the patch is empty (contains no occupied squares).
      Returns:
      true if the patch is empty, false otherwise.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the total size (surface) of the patch.
      Returns:
      The total size of the patch.

    • getGridValue

      public boolean getGridValue(int row, int col)
      Returns the value at the specified cell in the patch grid.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the cell.
      col - The column index of the cell.
      Returns:
      The value at the specified cell.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the row or column indices are out of bounds.

    • setGrid

      public void setGrid(boolean[][] newGrid)
      Sets the grid representing the patch.
      Parameters:
      newGrid - The new grid representing the patch.

    • rotate

      public Patch rotate(int degree)
      Returns a new Patch instance with the grid rotated by a given degree.
      Parameters:
      degree - The degree of rotation (90, 180, or 270 degrees).
      Returns:
      A new Patch instance with the rotated grid.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the degree is not one of 90, 180, or 270.
